frontpage.title: Performance
frontpage.desc: Spyric Performance adds a customisable performance meter to your app, which makes tracking performance & resource usage easy.

frontpage.title: Print to Display
frontpage.desc: Spyric Print to Display adds a console to your app, making it easy to view prints even while testing on devices.

frontpage.title: screen.lua
frontpage.desc: screen.lua is a table consisting of dynamically calculated screen dimensions, making creating dynamic UIs and games/apps easier (opens in a new page).

frontpage.title: verifyDomain
frontpage.desc: verifyDomain is a set of functions that you can use to verify that your HTML5 app is running on approved domains.

frontpage.title: Autotile
frontpage.desc: With Autotile, you can just touch a cell on a grid and it will figure out what tile should go there and update the connected tiles too.

demo.heading: Autotile
demo.desc: autotile is a simple Lua module that determines what tile should be placed to a selected location. Upon placing a tile, the module will also update all surrounding tiles as necessary. The GUI is developed using Solar2D.

frontpage.title: The Dark
frontpage.desc: Keep yourself and your campfire alive through a freezing winter night. Created for Ludum Dare 46 COMPO.

frontpage.title: Speed Test
frontpage.desc: A game written in under 150 lines of code where the goal is to follow the sequence of lights for as long as you can while the game speeds up.

frontpage.title: Runners
frontpage.desc: A game written in under 100 lines of code where the goal is to keep the runners from escaping.

frontpage.title: Bomb Tap
frontpage.desc: A game written in under 50 lines of code where the goal is to keep the bomb from touching anything.

frontpage.title: XeduR.com
frontpage.desc: This website that you are on right now! You've seen how it works, but if you want to see the source too, then look no further.

frontpage.title: Solar2D Playground
frontpage.desc: Solar2D Playground is an interactive website that allows you to create and run Solar2D projects instantly online.
frontpage.tech: GitHub Pages, Solar2D, Lua, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript

frontpage.title: Pseudorandom Number Generator
frontpage.desc: Interactive demo that demonstrates pseudorandom number generation, as well as source code for Lua and JS implementations for the LCG method.

frontpage.title: Reittiopas
frontpage.desc: A simple bus route planning web app created as a part of Solidabis' 2020 code challenge (NB! the app is in Finnish).
